scenario.situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The basenji swears to the llama. The chihuahua is named Teddy. The duck is named Tango. The poodle is currently in Berlin. The swan invests in the company whose owner is the poodle. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: The duck will smile at the poodle if it (the duck) has a name whose first letter is the same as the first letter of the chihuahua's name. Rule2: One of the rules of the game is that if the basenji swears to the llama, then the llama will never take over the emperor of the poodle. Rule3: In order to conclude that the poodle calls the cougar, two pieces of evidence are required: firstly the llama does not take over the emperor of the poodle and secondly the duck does not create a castle for the poodle. Rule4: Here is an important piece of information about the poodle: if it is in Germany at the moment then it negotiates a deal with the leopard for sure. Rule5: The poodle does not borrow a weapon from the dugong, in the case where the swan invests in the company whose owner is the poodle.

scenario.situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The bulldog has 50 dollars. The bulldog is watching a movie from 1975. The chinchilla has 21 dollars. The cobra is named Cinnamon. The elk has 59 dollars. The otter is named Chickpea. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: If the bulldog is watching a movie that was released after the first man landed on moon, then the bulldog does not suspect the truthfulness of the lizard. Rule2: If the cobra has a name whose first letter is the same as the first letter of the otter's name, then the cobra builds a power plant close to the green fields of the lizard. Rule3: The bulldog will not suspect the truthfulness of the lizard if it (the bulldog) has more money than the chinchilla and the elk combined. Rule4: For the lizard, if the belief is that the cobra builds a power plant close to the green fields of the lizard and the bulldog does not take over the emperor of the lizard, then you can add "the lizard creates one castle for the reindeer" to your conclusions.
